column3: ¡­ with idea_default.xml after divergence since commit a3f7112.
What does 'sync' mean? This profile is used on our internal CI, nothing else. Thanks

¡°Sync¡± means ¡°cause (a set of data or files) to remain identical in more than one location.¡± In this case, though, the files aren't intended to be completely identical; in commit a3f7112 idea_default_no_spellchecker.xml differs in two small ways: (1) the profile name has ¡°.no.spellchecker¡± appended, and (2) SpellCheckingInspection is disabled. I preserved those differences here.
As of recently it's used on our internal CI as well; hence concern about divergence here.
